title: New Collateral Type - pxUSD
body: In todays market PERL token shows big volatility as it follows BTC movements and it puts you at a high risk to lose all your collateral if your position gets liquidated. Considering high gas fees in Ethereum network its hard (expensive) to maintain your collateral size in dangerous situations when price drops. I propose to add option to use pxUSD as collateral for minting other pxAssets. It will reduce chance being liquidated when crypto market goes down. Also this change should incentivize more people to mint and stake pxUSD as demand for this asset will be increased.
